channel.title: RISE 718 RSPS || Brand New 3GB Hosted || Staff Applications Open
channel.description:
[center] Home: [url=http://rise-forums.com]http://rise-forums.com[/url] Forums: [url=http://rise-forums.com]http://rise-forums.com[/url] Webclient: [url=http://rise-forums.com/webclient/index.html]http://rise-forums.com/webclient/index.html[/url] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update Log Code: [November 15th, 2013]: RISE Began. [November 16th, 2013]: RISE moved it's home to Yanille, and had the area cleaned up and made approriate for the home. [November 16th, 2013]: RISE's forums were created, and laid out. [November 17th, 2013]: An NPC was created that would tell you about RISE. [November 17th, 2013]: An NPC was created that could tell you how to keep your account safe. [November 17th, 2013]: An NPC was created that could tell you ways of making money and getting started on RISE. [November 20th, 2013]: Fixed the skilling interfaces that wouldn't show up in the skilling dialogues [November 25th, 2013]: Added spinning, you can now spin items such as wool and flax. [November 28th, 2013]: Re-arranged the crystal key chest, and added in Caskets that would give you special items when opened. [December 1st, 2013]: Added in-game ::onlinetime and ::onlineranks command to check out your play time! [December 3rd, 2013]: Work was done to the forums, we made the Donation page. [December 5th, 2013]: Fixed slayer level requirements to attack monsters, and fixed up other slayer aspects. [December 6th, 2013]: Edgeville dungeons was completed. [December 7th, 2013]: Added a christmas event for all types of players to enjoy! Completing it will give you a special present! [December 8th, 2013]: Added a voting system so you can now vote for different options! [December 10th, 2013]: Added Squeal of Fortune, 100% working with right interfaces etc. Also added daily spins. [December 11th, 2013]: Worked a little on construction and managed to get the basics completed. [December 14th, 2013]: Started work on a dungeoneering system. Got the main features covered. [December 15th, 2013]: Added an Influence Point System, where you can gain points to spend by skilling, pvm'ing, and just being active! [December 19th, 2013]: Put up an Auto-donation method, so you can donate anytime and claim your points. More explained on the forums. [December 23rd, 2013]: Put a highscores system up that works. [December 24th, 2013]: RISE's Management Team took a break for Christmas, we all had a lovely christmas! :) [December 26th, 2013]: RISE's Management Team returned to start working on RISE, once again :) [December 27th, 2013]: Implemented some small updates and fixes to the server including safespotting, skilling errors. [December 29th, 2013]: Added enchanting and alching to RISE. [December 29th, 2013]: Added Chaos Tunnels to RISE. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Featuring: IPBoard Forums! 3GB VPS Hosted Server! 24/7 Uptime || No Lag --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Why Choose RISE?
Here at RISE our main focus is the players because of the fact that we always are looking for vouchers who can speak their mind about the server and have constructive criticism about our server, because a server runs on the basis of the development team along side the communication with the players! We at RISE believe this is mandatory to be a success along side the ideas the development team have. All server's are unique in their way, however they are never perfect, hence we chose the motto "Where Dreams Become Reality".
Some Features of RISE:
- Working Godwars - All Skills Working! - Working Slayer Tower! - Celebration events (Custom)! - Influence Point System! - All Altars (Curses, Ancients, Lunar Spells)! - 100% Squeal of Fortune! - 100% Completionist Cape/Max Cape Requirements! - Fight Kiln - Fight Caves - Barrows - Glacors - Ganodermic Beasts - Clan Wars - Nomad - Nex - Bork - New and Old Item Looks - Runespan - Queen Black Dragon - King Black Dragon - 100% Load Stones! - Dominion Tower!
We are currently using IPBoard Forums aswell!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Influence Points
What are Influence Points?
Influence Points are the main Points you can earn in RISE. They are used to purchase special items from the Influence Point Shops.
What Items do the shops Feature?
The Shops feature items which can help progress all play styles, such as tools for Skillers, weapons and other equipment for PvM'ers/PvP'ers. Rune Boxes containing a certain amount of Runes for a spell. The shops also feature clothing to make your character stand out from the rest. We are constantly developing new things for the Influence Points Shop.
How do you get Influence Points?
In RISE, there are many different methods of gaining Influence Points. One of the basic methods is just being online, you receive a certain amount of Points every 30 minutes you are active in the server. You can also gain Influence Points by killing monsters, skilling, leveling a skill, killing players, completing Special Events, and Voting.
Find out more Features on our Forums! Media coming Soon![/center]

item.title: RISE 718 RSPS || Brand New 3GB Hosted || Staff Applications Open
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You need to fix those crowns, and attempt to find a new theme - overused theme indeed it is.

Good luck with the server and what not though.

Read full topic
item.source: RISE 718 RSPS || Brand New 3GB Hosted || Staff Applications Open

item.title: RISE 718 RSPS || Brand New 3GB Hosted || Staff Applications Open
item.dc:creator: @Evoloution Evoloution
item.description:
@Evoloution wrote:

[center]
Home: http://rise-forums.com
Forums: http://rise-forums.com
Webclient: http://rise-forums.com/webclient/index.html

Update Log
Code:
[November 15th, 2013]: RISE Began.
[November 16th, 2013]: RISE moved it’s home to Yanille, and had the area cleaned up and made approriate for the home.
[November 16th, 2013]: RISE’s forums were created, and laid out.
[November 17th, 2013]: An NPC was created that would tell you about RISE.
[November 17th, 2013]: An NPC was created that could tell you how to keep your account safe.
[November 17th, 2013]: An NPC was created that could tell you ways of making money and getting started on RISE.
[November 20th, 2013]: Fixed the skilling interfaces that wouldn’t show up in the skilling dialogues
[November 25th, 2013]: Added spinning, you can now spin items such as wool and flax.
[November 28th, 2013]: Re-arranged the crystal key chest, and added in Caskets that would give you special items when opened.
[December 1st, 2013]: Added in-game ::onlinetime and ::onlineranks command to check out your play time!
[December 3rd, 2013]: Work was done to the forums, we made the Donation page.
[December 5th, 2013]: Fixed slayer level requirements to attack monsters, and fixed up other slayer aspects.
[December 6th, 2013]: Edgeville dungeons was completed.
[December 7th, 2013]: Added a christmas event for all types of players to enjoy! Completing it will give you a special present!
[December 8th, 2013]: Added a voting system so you can now vote for different options!
[December 10th, 2013]: Added Squeal of Fortune, 100% working with right interfaces etc. Also added daily spins.
[December 11th, 2013]: Worked a little on construction and managed to get the basics completed.
[December 14th, 2013]: Started work on a dungeoneering system. Got the main features covered.
[December 15th, 2013]: Added an Influence Point System, where you can gain points to spend by skilling, pvm’ing, and just being active!
[December 19th, 2013]: Put up an Auto-donation method, so you can donate anytime and claim your points. More explained on the forums.
[December 23rd, 2013]: Put a highscores system up that works.
[December 24th, 2013]: RISE’s Management Team took a break for Christmas, we all had a lovely christmas!
[December 26th, 2013]: RISE’s Management Team returned to start working on RISE, once again
[December 27th, 2013]: Implemented some small updates and fixes to the server including safespotting, skilling errors.
[December 29th, 2013]: Added enchanting and alching to RISE.
[December 29th, 2013]: Added Chaos Tunnels to RISE.

Featuring:
IPBoard Forums!
3GB VPS Hosted Server!
24/7 Uptime || No Lag

Why Choose RISE?

Here at RISE our main focus is the players because of the fact that we always
are looking for vouchers who can speak their mind about the server and have
constructive criticism about our server, because a server runs on the basis of
the development team along side the communication with the players! We
at RISE believe this is mandatory to be a success along side the ideas the
development team have. All server’s are unique in their way, however they
are never perfect, hence we chose the motto “Where Dreams Become Reality”.

Some Features of RISE:

  • Working Godwars
  • All Skills Working!
  • Working Slayer Tower!
  • Celebration events (Custom)!
  • Influence Point System!
  • All Altars (Curses, Ancients, Lunar Spells)!
  • 100% Squeal of Fortune!
  • 100% Completionist Cape/Max Cape Requirements!
  • Fight Kiln
  • Fight Caves
  • Barrows
  • Glacors
  • Ganodermic Beasts
  • Clan Wars
  • Nomad
  • Nex
  • Bork
  • New and Old Item Looks
  • Runespan
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • King Black Dragon
  • 100% Load Stones!
  • Dominion Tower!

We are currently using IPBoard Forums aswell!

Influence Points

What are Influence Points?

Influence Points are the main Points you can earn in RISE. They are used to purchase special items from the Influence Point Shops.

What Items do the shops Feature?

The Shops feature items which can help progress all play styles, such as tools for Skillers, weapons and other equipment for PvM’ers/PvP’ers. Rune Boxes containing a certain amount of Runes for a spell. The shops also feature clothing to make your character stand out from the rest. We are constantly developing new things for the Influence Points Shop.

How do you get Influence Points?

In RISE, there are many different methods of gaining Influence Points. One of the basic methods is just being online, you receive a certain amount of Points every 30 minutes you are active in the server. You can also gain Influence Points by killing monsters, skilling, leveling a skill, killing players, completing Special Events, and Voting.

Find out more Features on our Forums!
Media coming Soon![/center]
